text: Describe an algorithm for adding rational numbers. How does this compare to your algorithm for adding whole numbers?

Student should have an algorithm for adding any two rational numbers, connecting to number lines, chip boards and/or patterns.

  • When the numbers are either both positive or both negativeâ€”add the numbers and give the sum the same sign as the numbers added.

OR

  • To add two positive numbers, add the numbers, and make the number in the sum positive
  • To add two negatives, add the two numbers and make the number in the sum negative
  • To add a positive and negative number find the difference between the two numbers and the sign on the number for the sum is the same as the sign of the number with the larger absolute value (or said as the sign of the number that is further from 0).
